AsyncTrigger.AsyncTrigger

Function/Meaning
Construction of AsyncTrigger object
Type
Constructor of AsyncTrigger class
Syntax
AsyncTrigger(owner, actionname="action")
Arguments
owner Specifies the target where the event will occur.
actionname Specifies the name of the method to receive the event in the object specified by owner. If an empty string is specified, owner is treated as a method and is called directly whenever an event occurs.
Return Value
None (void)
Description
Constructs an object of the AsyncTrigger class.
